title: FAKE Alert: RBI has NOT stopped Aadhaar enabled Payment Systems | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A claim has surfaced on social media according to which the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has stopped Aadhaar enabled Payment Systems (AePS) due to the lockdown amid Coronavirus.

ALSO READ: Restaurants and hotels in India to be closed till October 15?…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above claim and found it to be FAKE.

Government sources confirmed that no such move has been made by the authorities and the claims are baseless.

The Press Information Bureau (PIB) in a tweet, explicitly clarified, that this information is untrue and that the RBI has not disabled any server related to AePS.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the viral claim is FAKE.
